DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effectiveness motivational interviewing promote maintenance physical activity people Type 2 diabetes ( T2D ) upon completion structure exercise program . Participants T2D new graduate supervise exercise program randomly assign either standard care ( SC ) standard care addition , participate two individual motivational interview ( MI ) session ( SC + MI ) . The primary outcome change physical activity behavior assess Godin Leisure Exercise questionnaire . Secondary outcome include change blood glucose control ( A1C ) , BMI , six minute walk-test , QoL , self-efficacy . Outcomes measured group baseline , end program , 3 month 6 month post-program .
DOC.brief_title: Motivational Interviewing Promote Maintenance Physical Activity People With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: ) selfreported physician diagnosed T2D , include treated diet alone , oral medication insulin b ) clearance Living Well clinical staff exercise GXT algorithm triaged `` Keep Going '' level class , c ) least 18 year age , ) ability read write English . ) insulin therapy begin less 2 year T2D diagnosis , b ) change previous 2 month oral hypoglycemic
DOC.keyword: Type 2 diabetes , motivational interviewing , physical activity maintenance , physical activity adherence
